Desc.entry: A public forum to engage the public and scientists in a shared discussion on scientific topics and ethical issues, which arise from research. Holds monthly meetings where a scientist is invited to give a short talk (approximately 20 minutes), which is followed by a discussion. Occasionally there may be a theatre presentation, film screening or other media used to start the discussion. The meetings are friendly and informal with no scientific knowledge required. Events are free and no booking is necessary. Also has a Facebook page and a blog - please see website for details.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Usually 1st Mon in the month at 7pm (except for bank holidays, when it moves to 2nd Mon in the month) - please see website for details
